pages.text: It was {{MAIN_CHARACTER}}'s birthday! {{PRONOUN_SUBJECTIVE}} woke up excited to see what adventures the day would bring. The sun was shining brightly through the window.
textVariants: Today was {{MAIN_CHARACTER}}'s special day! {{PRONOUN_SUBJECTIVE}} jumped out of bed, eager to discover what exciting surprises awaited. Sunshine streamed through the curtains.

{{MAIN_CHARACTER}} opened {{PRONOUN_POSSESSIVE}} eyes on birthday morning! {{PRONOUN_SUBJECTIVE}} could barely contain {{PRONOUN_POSSESSIVE}} excitement for the day ahead. Golden light filled the room.

pages.text: {{MAIN_CHARACTER}} found a mysterious map on {{PRONOUN_POSSESSIVE}} birthday table. It showed the way to hidden treasure! {{PRONOUN_SUBJECTIVE}} grabbed {{PRONOUN_POSSESSIVE}} backpack and called {{SIDE_CHARACTER}} to join the adventure.
textVariants: On the breakfast table sat an ancient-looking map with {{MAIN_CHARACTER}}'s name on it. The treasure marker caught {{PRONOUN_POSSESSIVE}} eye immediately! {{PRONOUN_SUBJECTIVE}} quickly found {{SIDE_CHARACTER}} to share the discovery.
A rolled-up treasure map lay beside {{MAIN_CHARACTER}}'s birthday cake. {{PRONOUN_SUBJECTIVE}} unrolled it carefully, eyes widening at what it promised. {{SIDE_CHARACTER}} had to see this!

pages.text: Following the map, {{MAIN_CHARACTER}} and {{SIDE_CHARACTER}} discovered {{OBJECT_1}} hidden behind a waterfall! But the journey wasn't over yet. The map showed one more secret location to explore.
textVariants: The waterfall's roar grew louder as they approached. Behind the cascading water, {{MAIN_CHARACTER}} spotted {{OBJECT_1}} glowing softly! {{SIDE_CHARACTER}} pointed at the map—another marker remained.
{{SIDE_CHARACTER}} helped {{MAIN_CHARACTER}} climb through the waterfall cave. There, resting on a stone pedestal, was {{OBJECT_1}}! The map hinted at one final treasure spot.

pages.text: At the final spot, {{MAIN_CHARACTER}} found {{OBJECT_2}} glowing with magical light! It was the most amazing birthday surprise. {{SIDE_CHARACTER}} cheered as {{PRONOUN_SUBJECTIVE}} picked it up carefully.
textVariants: The X on the map led them to an ancient oak tree. Beneath its roots, {{OBJECT_2}} shimmered with enchanted energy! {{MAIN_CHARACTER}} couldn't believe {{PRONOUN_POSSESSIVE}} luck—what a birthday gift!
{{SIDE_CHARACTER}} dug near the marked stone while {{MAIN_CHARACTER}} checked the map. Suddenly, brilliant light burst forth—{{OBJECT_2}} emerged, more magnificent than anything they'd imagined!

pages.text: {{MAIN_CHARACTER}} returned home with {{SIDE_CHARACTER}}, carrying {{PRONOUN_POSSESSIVE}} treasures proudly. It had been the best birthday adventure ever! {{PRONOUN_SUBJECTIVE}} couldn't wait to tell everyone about the magical journey.
textVariants: As the sun began to set, {{MAIN_CHARACTER}} and {{SIDE_CHARACTER}} made their way back, treasures in hand. What an unforgettable birthday celebration! Everyone at home would love hearing this tale.

The adventure complete, {{MAIN_CHARACTER}} walked home alongside {{SIDE_CHARACTER}}, both grinning from ear to ear. This birthday would be remembered forever! The magical treasures would remind {{PRONOUN_OBJECTIVE}} of this perfect day.
